name: DailySchedule
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily schedule
des:
Below is the detailed description how to use skill Daily schedule

To open skill:
"Alexa, open Daily Schedule"

To add a person:
Add {Person} to the team

To add task for a person:
remind {Person} to {Task}

To list items for a person:
list items for {Person}

To delete task for a person:
delete task {Number} for {Person}

To reset:
clear
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
